greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor((numerator of H(n))/n), where H(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} 1/k is the n-th harmonic number.
comment: Numerator of H(n) is a(n)*n + A126083(n).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2310
mathematica: seq = {}; s = 0; Do[s += 1/n; AppendTo[seq, Floor[Numerator[s]/n]], {n, 1, 30}]; seq (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 01 2020 *)
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Mar 03 2007
